item.title: #4: AI for Social Good ‚Äî India Summit, Legal Gaps in Disaster AI, 1.1B Hunger Crisis
item.description:
AI for social impact daily briefing ‚Äî Impact Signals covers how artificial intelligence is transforming disaster response, humanitarian aid, and social good.
AI for social impact daily briefing ‚Äî Impact Signals covers how artificial intelligence is transforming disaster response, humanitarian aid, and social good. Today: India AI Impact Summit opens as the first major AI summit in the Global South, UNDRR warns legal gaps block AI disaster response, and an AI model predicts 1.1 billion could face hunger by 2100.
TOP STORIES
1. India AI Impact Summit Opens ‚Äî 250,000 Expected at First Global South AI Summit PM Modi inaugurated the five-day summit at Bharat Mandapam, New Delhi. 20 national leaders, 45 ministerial delegations, tech CEOs from Google, NVIDIA, Microsoft, OpenAI. India positions "Digital Public Infrastructure" as AI-as-public-utility model.
2. UNDRR: AI Disaster Apps Useless Without Legal Framework UNDRR's Sujit Mohanty: district magistrates cannot legally rely on AI predictions for evacuations. Global disaster losses ~$200B annually. Calls for regulatory scaffolding alongside technology deployment.
3. AI Model: Climate Change Could Push 1.1 Billion Into Hunger by 2100 Nature Scientific Reports study using only temperature/precipitation data. 600M+ children at risk. Africa: 170M face starvation in 2099. Minimal-data approach makes it deployable in data-scarce humanitarian regions.
4. India Launches SAHI & BODH Healthcare AI Frameworks National AI healthcare strategy plus open benchmarking platform for health AI models. BODH fills critical gap for transparent model comparison in low-resource settings.
5. Nonprofit AI Report: 92% Adopt, Only 7% See Impact 346-org study. 81% use AI individually without shared workflows. 47% no governance. Real impact requires workflow redesign, not just tool adoption.
6. Kerala AI Disaster Preparedness Roadmap AI heat stress predictions, mobile-first emergency alerts from 2018 flood lessons. Transferable to climate-vulnerable regions globally.
7. China: AI Security = National Disaster Category First nation to classify AI incidents alongside earthquakes in emergency response plans.
8. UN Women + Bioniks: AI Prosthetics in Pakistan AI-powered prosthetic limbs for rural women at dramatically lower costs. Homegrown Global South AI innovation.
UPCOMING: India AI Summit (Feb 16-20, New Delhi). ITU AI for Good (Feb 18, virtual). Stanford HAI Africa AI Leaders (Feb 25). Code4Sudan Hackathon (through Feb 28). AAAI AI+HADR Symposium (Apr 7-9, Burlingame).
ACTIVE MONITORING: Madagascar Cyclone Gezani ‚Äî 59+ dead, 400K in need. East Africa drought ‚Äî 4.6M affected. Sudan conflict ‚Äî 862K reached by Human Appeal. South Sudan ‚Äî 280K displaced. Haiti displacement ongoing.
Full research and sources at impactsignals.ai
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bkxTqb91CG4 üì© Subscribe: https://impactsignalsai.substack.com üåê Website: https://impactsignals.ai/episodes/4

item.title: #3: AI and Humanitarian Aid ‚Äî India AI Summit, AI Prosthetics in Pakistan, UN Global AI Fund
item.description:
AI for social impact daily briefing ‚Äî Impact Signals covers how artificial intelligence is transforming disaster response, humanitarian aid, and social good.
Impact Signals #3: India AI Summit Opens as First Global South Host, AI Prosthetics Transform Lives in Pakistan, UN Proposes Global AI Fund
AI for Impact Daily Briefing ‚Äî February 15, 2026
The India AI Impact Summit 2026 kicks off tomorrow in New Delhi ‚Äî the first major global AI summit hosted in the Global South, with 700+ sessions and attendees including UN SG Guterres, Pichai, Altman, Amodei, and Gates. Meanwhile, UN Women and Bioniks Technologies are delivering AI-powered prosthetic limbs to women in Pakistan, and UN SG Guterres proposed a Global Fund on AI at the African Union Summit.
TOP STORIES
1. India AI Summit Opens Tomorrow ‚Äî First Global AI Summit in the Global South 700+ sessions at Bharat Mandapam, New Delhi (Feb 16-20). Theme: "People, Planet, and Progress." 4,650+ AI challenge applications on healthcare, climate, and inclusive growth. UN side events showcase UNICEF, WHO, UNDP deployments.
2. AI-Powered Prosthetics Transform Lives in Pakistan Bioniks Technologies + UN Women deliver AI prosthetic limbs for women in Sindh province who lost hands to fodder-cutting machines. Lightweight bionic arms enable return to hand embroidery ‚Äî their primary income source.
3. UN SG Proposes Global Fund on AI at AU Summit At 39th AU Summit in Addis Ababa, Guterres proposed a Global Fund on AI for developing nations. Nations missing AI adoption risk falling 50 years behind. Targets African data sovereignty and compute ownership.
4. AXA + Planet Labs for Real-Time Disaster Monitoring Planet Labs' near-daily satellite imagery integrated into AXA's AI risk platform. Monitors and predicts floods, wildfires, hurricanes in near-real-time. Direct humanitarian applications.
5. SPARC AI: GPS-Denied Drone Navigation for SAR Software-only update enables drones in GPS-jammed environments using ML + visual cues. Critical for conflict zones and disaster areas. Zero-signature protects humanitarian workers.
6. 60-Day Flood Forecasting Framework CNNs + hydrological modeling achieve 60-day streamflow forecasting ‚Äî extending early warning from days to months.
7. East Africa Drought: 4.6M Affected Severe drought across Somalia, Ethiopia, Kenya. 135K+ displaced in Somalia. Copernicus EMS + FEWS NET satellite-AI systems actively tracking conditions.
8. OpenStreetMap Photon 1.0.0 Major geocoder update reduces hardware needs ‚Äî field teams run offline search on laptops in disaster zones.
UPCOMING: India AI Summit (Feb 16-20, New Delhi). Sankalp Africa Summit (Feb 25-26, Nairobi). AI for Good Hackathon (Mar 14, Waterloo). AAAI AI+HADR Symposium (Apr 7-9, Burlingame).
ACTIVE MONITORING: East Africa drought ‚Äî 4.6M affected. Forest fires across Myanmar, Cambodia, Ethiopia, Senegal, Guinea, CAR. Colombia flooding. South Sudan ‚Äî 280K displaced. Haiti displacement.
Full research, sources, and links at impactsignalsai.substack.com
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mf5xDQr2M-o üì© Subscribe: https://impactsignalsai.substack.com üåê Website: https://impactsignals.ai/episodes/3

item.title: #2: Social Impact of AI ‚Äî AI Drones in War, Wildfire Early Action Protocol
item.description:
AI for social impact daily briefing ‚Äî Impact Signals covers how artificial intelligence is transforming disaster response, humanitarian aid, and social good.
Impact Signals #2: AI Drones Turning Wars on Civilians, World's First Wildfire Early Action Protocol, Google Expands Flood Forecasting Across Africa
AI for Impact Daily Briefing ‚Äî February 14, 2026
The ICRC president warns at Munich Security Conference that AI-powered drones are turning wars into wars on civilians. Meanwhile, the IFRC activates the world's first AI-driven wildfire Early Action Protocol in Chile ‚Äî forecast-based financing that released funds automatically before fires hit peak intensity. Google expands flood forecasting across Africa with the AU, WHO launches an AI emergency response toolkit, and Caltech unveils a multi-modal search-and-rescue robot.
TOP STORIES
1. ICRC Chief Warns AI & Drones Turning Wars on Civilians ‚Äî ICRC President Spoljaric at Munich Security Conference: "There's never a moment where drones fight against drones." Calls for protective interpretation of international humanitarian law.
2. IFRC Activates World's First Wildfire Early Action Protocol in Chile ‚Äî Predictive models triggered automatic release of 95,000 CHF to help 2,000 people before fires peaked. Additional 500,000 CHF supported evacuation of 50,000.
3. Google Expands AI Flood Forecasting Across Africa ‚Äî Flood Hub expands to Nigeria and Ethiopia. GiveDirectly delivers pre-disaster cash transfers based on AI predictions. AU Commission partnership signals continental scale.
4. WHO Launches AI-Powered Emergency Response Toolkit (AIM) ‚Äî Generative AI compresses emergency response documents from weeks to minutes. Now in production.
5. Caltech Unveils X1: Multi-Modal SAR Robot ‚Äî Hybrid humanoid-drone that walks, flies, and drives autonomously. GPS-denied drone navigation also released by Sparc AI.
6. University of Twente: AI + Drone Logistics Simulation ‚Äî Tested on six historical disasters. Optimizes for cost, speed, risk, and suffering reduction simultaneously.
7. Salesforce Agentforce Powers Good360 Disaster Relief Matching ‚Äî AI cut donation-matching time from 30 to 10 minutes during LA wildfires.
8. AI Heatwave Early Warning for Gulf Region ‚Äî Khalifa University study on 2024 Makkah heatwave (1,300+ deaths). AI can predict extreme heat days in advance.
UPCOMING: India AI Impact Summit (Feb 16-20, New Delhi) ‚Äî first Global South AI summit. IBM Impact Accelerator applications open through March 25. AAAI AI+HADR Symposium April 7-9.
ACTIVE MONITORING: Vanuatu M6.4 earthquake (Feb 14). Colombia flooding ‚Äî HNRP 2026 launched. South Sudan Jonglei conflict ‚Äî 280K displaced. Syria ongoing response. Haiti displacement from Port-au-Prince attacks.
Full research, sources, and links at impactsignalsai.substack.com
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xo5h-kYpbxg üì© Subscribe: https://impactsignalsai.substack.com üåê Website: https://impactsignals.ai/episodes/2

item.title: #1: AI for Social Impact ‚Äî UN AI Panel, India Summit, and Why Aid Is Collapsing
item.description:
AI for social impact daily briefing ‚Äî Impact Signals covers how artificial intelligence is transforming disaster response, humanitarian aid, and social good.
The UN voted 117-2 to create its first AI Scientific Panel. India hosts the biggest Global South AI summit. The IRC warns of humanitarian funding collapse. Plus: Vanuatu earthquake update, Africa's expanding early warning systems, and AI reading brain MRIs at 97.5% accuracy.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B6yitlQuv4w üì© Subscribe: https://impactsignalsai.substack.com üåê Website: https://impactsignals.ai/episodes/1
